backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profiles, access control, profile search, and friend request management with persistent maps.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report mapping a feature request to related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence level.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of various frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes with a terracotta/amber palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application with the Tchat title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, UI dialogs, theme provider, and chat layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout with React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/chat/InviteToRoo: Dialog for inviting friends to rooms, showing profiles or fallbacks and adding users via hooks.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Provides a chat input form allowing text and image messages with validation, previews, and upload progress before sending to a room.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageThre: Displays messages for a room with avatars, images, auto‑scrolling, and an invite dialog, handling loading and errors.
frontend/src/components/chat/RoomList.ts: Lists chat rooms, supports room selection, and includes a form for creating new rooms with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsD: Implements a dialog for searching users, viewing friends, and sending friend requests with profile loading states.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileE: Dialog for editing user profile details including name, bio, avatar color, and optional profile picture upload with preview.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileN: Renders a user’s display name from their profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Initial profile creation dialog collecting name and bio before saving a new user profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserAvat: Renders a user avatar, showing a profile picture when available or falling back to initials with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: A modal dialog allowing users to change theme and message polling interval, with form validation and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Provides hooks to list and create chat rooms via the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useFriends.ts: Contains hooks for searching users, fetching friends, and sending or accepting friend requests through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an auth provider and hooks for managing Internet Identity login state, persistence, and client creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMembers.ts: Provides a mutation hook to add users to a room and refresh room lists afterward.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoomMessages.ts: Exposes hooks for fetching room messages with optional polling and posting new messages with targeted cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserPreferences.ts: Empty placeholder file for user preference hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating user profiles, including caller profile caching and safe remote fetch handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom color themes for light, dark, and black modes using CSS variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/flags.ts: Empty utility file reserved for flag-related logic.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Stores project state metadata, feature list, issues, and architectural notes for the chat app.
